AE 504M.course_name: Intraoperative & Postoperative Mgmt of the Cardiac Surgical Patient

AE 505M.course_description: ?p?This course provides students with an introduction to the anesthesia care of children. The student will participate in departmental conferences and the pre-, intra-, and post-operative evaluation and management of patients undergoing anesthesia and surgery.?/p?
